(OOC: Yes, EVERYONE should be able to hear this, unless they choose not
to=
o. I hope it come out formatted correctly. I pasted this from a word
docume=
nt. Sometimes it does not come out right.)



BIC:



Darkness invaded the =
halls of the Ark like smoke, the deafening sound of
silence echoed along it=
s length like some dark spectre. Its heart had
gone as cold as death as the=
 heat of power melted away; its only
defenders  locked behind teeth of igno=
rance, constrained by chains as
hard as the fear that gripped it all.



Th=
en sound came through . . .



>

> [BEEP . . . BEEP . . . BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE=
EEEEEEPPPPPPPPPP]





The universal sound of death was transmitted thought=
 the length and
breadth of the Ark and then as dark fingers manipulated con=
trols it was
played through all radio channels.



Maximal, Autobot, Decept=
icon and Predacon we privy to the sound!



> "Her systems are in the midst=
 of a complete self reboot. She will

> restart in ten seconds."



Came th=
e cold voice of Legacy. It could be clearly heard in the ears of
everyone, =
his voice amplified in some strange way. Even to the warriors
on the battle=
 field this voice was sent!



> "5 seconds . . . 3 seconds . . ." Legacy c=
alled out in his cold

> timeless voice. " 2 . . 1 . . .

>

> *KUTCHUNK*

=


That noise, the sound off all power being cut could not be mistaken for
a=
nything else as it too transmitted distinctly over the radio!



> "Scrap!"=
 Santon said somewhere in the darkness.



This was followed by silence, an=
d then . . .





> "Turn HER ON!!!!!"



It was Perceptor's voice, the ang=
er in it almost poignant as if
coming from deep within his spark.



> "You=
're murdering her!!!!!"



Those last words echoing . . .



>"murdering he=
r!!!!!"    >"murdering her!!!!!"   >"murdering her!!!!!"



A raspy laugh c=
ame over the radio, playing to all the combatants at or
near Black Tower. I=
t was a voice that was clearly unused to speaking. A
dark voice, one built =
seemingly from the shadows themselves.



Maximals, Autobots, "If you wish =
to save your companion you will lay
down your weapons, Now!"



Inside the =
Ark a small light came on over Nightlight's bed as a
small trickle of power=
 was restored to her. It was enough to keep her
alive, but not enough to re=
boot her systems.



She was on borrowed time or perhaps the word lended wo=
uld be more apt .
. .



(TAG)



Preston
